Articles.Content:
Hi,

X9Squared here, been playing KSP for just about a month. I've put a few satellites into orbit, come inches (probably literally a few times) from death flying spaceplanes and crashed countless craft. Currently I'm attempting to orbital rendezvous and dock my first 2 craft. I tried once, but wasn't able to get the orbits lined up and ended up putting my 3rd satelitte into orbit. Also, I have a pending application to Sparrowhawk Aeronautics, hopefully I get accepted (PLEASE TELL EORIN TO ACCEPT ME PLS PLS PLS).

X9 ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

P.S. "Please don't crash..." is probably my most said phrase in the past few weeks, "DANGIT" being the second.

EDIT: I've been accepted into Kerbal Minds Corp. Wohoo!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-13T23:21:58Z" title="08/13/2015 11:21  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 13, 2015</time> by X9Squared**
Sounds like you're having fun. Welcome to 'the program' ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Welcome to the forums! I wonder what your craft designs look like, they probably are nice.

Hello there,

...

> 
> ...Welcome to 'the program' ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

...
It was about time to do some rapid unplanned disassembly. After succesfull explosions some of us like to worship various things, there are... Partcount, ... deltaVee,... ...the Kraken of course... ,... more explosions,... RAM brackets..., ... pizza,... ..., mint icecream..., spacebar,... ... many good things to worship here ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)!

Have a good stay with us!

Welcome aboard, goshdarnit!

![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

It's nice to see you already are a healthy, productive member of the community. Stay well!
